meanings.sent1: The small, unobtrusive bird quietly perched on the branch.
meanings.sent2: The unobtrusive design of the room made it feel spacious.
meanings.sent3: The unobtrusive cat stealthily snuck up on the unsuspecting mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her unobtrusive presence in the meeting was like a whisper in a crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The unobtrusive painting in the corner added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.sent1: He preferred to wear unobtrusive colors to blend in with the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The security guard remained unobtrusive while keeping a watchful eye on the premises.
meanings.sent3: The unobtrusive waiter skillfully served the VIP guests without interrupting their conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her unobtrusive smile hid a mischievous twinkle in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The unobtrusive scent of fresh flowers filled the room with a subtle fragrance.
